com.mr.http

接口 MR_Cache

  • 所有已知实现类:
    MR_DiskBasedCache, MR_NoCache

    public interface MR_Cache
    An interface for a cache keyed by a String with a byte array as data.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  MR_Cache.Entry
      Data and metadata for an entry returned by the cache.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void clear()
      Empties the cache.
      MR_Cache.Entry get(java.lang.String key)
      Retrieves an entry from the cache.
      void initialize()
      Performs any potentially long-running actions needed to initialize the cache; will be called from a worker thread.
      void invalidate(java.lang.String key, boolean fullExpire)
      Invalidates an entry in the cache.
      void put(java.lang.String key, MR_Cache.Entry entry)
      Adds or replaces an entry to the cache.
      void remove(java.lang.String key)
      Removes an entry from the cache.

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        MR_Cache.Entry get(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieves an entry from the cache.
        参数:
        key - Cache key
        返回:
        An MR_Cache.Entry or null in the event of a cache miss

      • put

        void put(java.lang.String key,
       MR_Cache.Entry entry)
        Adds or replaces an entry to the cache.
        参数:
        key - Cache key
        entry - Data to store and metadata for cache coherency, TTL, etc.

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Performs any potentially long-running actions needed to initialize the cache; will be called from a worker thread.

      • invalidate

        void invalidate(java.lang.String key,
              boolean fullExpire)
        Invalidates an entry in the cache.
        参数:
        key - Cache key
        fullExpire - True to fully expire the entry, false to soft expire

      • remove

        void remove(java.lang.String key)
        Removes an entry from the cache.
        参数:
        key - Cache key

      • clear

        void clear()
        Empties the cache.
